meanings.definition: The quality or characteristic of being related to or connected with history.
meanings.sent1: The historicalness of the artifact made it valuable to the museum.
meanings.sent2: Studying the historicalness of ancient civilizations helps us understand the past.
meanings.sent3: The historicalness of the old photograph brought back memories of a bygone era.
meanings.sent4: Her dress exuded historicalness, as if it had been worn by royalty centuries ago.
meanings.sent5: The historicalness of the castle was evident in every stone and tapestry.

meanings.definition: The state of being significant or important in history.
meanings.sent1: The historicalness of the event was felt by all who attended.
meanings.sent2: His speech highlighted the historicalness of the occasion.
meanings.sent3: The historicalness of the discovery was celebrated with great enthusiasm.
meanings.sent4: The historicalness of the battle echoed through the ages.
meanings.sent5: The historicalness of the document was undeniable, shaping the course of events.
